altTitle: 家事万能の俺が孤高（?）の美少女を朝から夜までお世話することになった話
Kaji Bannou no Ore ga Kokou（?）no Bisyoujyo wo Asa kara Yoru made O-Sewa suru Kotoni natta Hanashi
The Story of Me, a Boy Versatile in Housework, Taking Care of a Solitary (?) but Beautiful Girl from Morning Till Night
title: Kaji Bannou no Ore ga Kokou (?) no Bishoujo wo Asa kara Yoru made Osewa Suru Koto ni Natta Hanashi
